EmailTemplate.name: Doggies Day Out
EmailTemplate.subject: Doggies Day Out- AN NCS grad-led event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
A group of NCS grads are running an amazing event to raise money for local charity, NICE. It's a Doggies Day Out!
Taking place this Saturday, 26th March at 12pm at NICEs building in Cannon Hill Park. Have a dog? Know someone who does? Can you come along and support them?
Sign up here https://www.facebook.com/events/1054271481295907/
